# Ultimate IDOR parameter wordlist (subset)
# User & Account
id
user
user_id
userid
uid
account
account_id
accountid
profile
profile_id
member
member_id
customer
customer_id
client
client_id
subscriber
subscriber_id
partner
partner_id
vendor
vendor_id
contact
contact_id
lead
lead_id
manager
manager_id
employee
employee_id
staff
staff_id
student
student_id
teacher
teacher_id
agent
agent_id
player
player_id
registrant
registrant_id
applicant
applicant_id

order
order_id
orderid
booking
booking_id
reservation
reservation_id
transaction
transaction_id
txn
txn_id
invoice

receipt
receipt_id
payment
payment_id
cart
cart_id
checkout
checkout_id
ticket
ticket_id
shipment
shipment_id
delivery
delivery_id
tracking
tracking_id
tracking_number
waybill
waybill_number
subscription
subscription_id
loan
loan_id
policy
policy_id
claim
claim_id
wallet
wallet_id
ref
ref_id
reference
reference_id

# UUID/GUID variants
uuid
UUID
guid
GUID
user_uuid
